privacyLaws.description: Introduced on February 14, 2023, and it has been passed to the House Technology and Infrastructure Committee. This bill would create a private right of action and give consumers rights over the privacy of their data.
Introduced on February 14, 2023, and it has been passed to the House Finance Committee. This bill aims to establish a framework for controlling and processing personal data in the State.

privacyLaws.lawName: Article 2A, Breach of Security of Consumer Information
privacyLaws.description: The purpose of this article is to ensure transparency and accountability in the event of a breach of security involving consumer information, thereby safeguarding the interests and privacy of consumers in West Virginia.

privacyLaws.lawName: West Virginia Health Care Records Law
privacyLaws.description: The Health Care Records Law was out in place to protect the privacy and security of individuals' health care records.
This article pertains to employer access to employee or potential employee personal accounts and outlines certain prohibitions and exceptions.
The Electronic Mail Protection Act addresses violations and the right of action for injunction and damages regarding unauthorized bulk electronic mail messages.

privacyLaws.lawName: Student Data Accessibility, Transparency and Accountability Act
privacyLaws.description: This act focuses on ensuring transparency and accountability regarding student data accessibility.
